tool.name: PINN Interior Sample Point Generator
tool.description: Sample point generator for interior points for training PINN
tool.command: cp '$CAD_Input' Output_Vessel.stl && cp '$__tool_directory__/PINN_training_point_gen.py' ./run.py && python run.py -n '$num_points' 2>&1 && mv test.txt '$Points'

param.name: num_points
param.label: Number of Points
param.help: Number of points to generate for the PINN to sample from.

param.name: CAD_Input
param.label: CAD_Input
param.help: CAD Input for Sample Point Generation (From Paramak Generator). Format: STL

data.name: Points
data.label: Points
data.help: List of points for the PINN to sample from. Format: txt

tool.help: Sample point generator for interior points for training PINN
